titles.title: For the relief of Cathleen S. O'Regan.

bill.summary: 6/12/1987--Introduced. Allows a named individual, notwithstanding certain limitations, to bring an action against the United States arising out of medical treatment received at a U.S. Army health facility in Munich, Germany.
